** Deprecated, just use Melee Code Manager's tools **

These are the DOL and RAM differences between different versions of Melee.

This is useful for:
- Determining the difference between DOL offsets and RAM addresses.
- Determining where code changes exist between different versions of smash to convert changes from one to another.

This file was designed for _glook's own purposes so it's a bit unorganized, but it's still useful to have, nonetheless.


v1.00 to v1.02 addresses
N = not applicable
? = Unknown

RAM 1.00 (DOL1.0) + DIFF = RAM 1.02 (DOL1.2)
--------------------------------------------
80000000 (NNNNNN) + 0000 = 80000000 (NNNNNN)
- 3000 -
80003000 (000000) + 0000 = 80003000 (000000)
- B2FC -
8000E2FC (00AEDC) + 0000 = 8000E2FC (00AEDC)
8000E300 (00AEE0) + 0004 = 8000E304 (00AEE4)
8000E304 (00AEE4) + 0018 = 8000E31C (00AEFC)
- 16C -
8000E470 (00B050) + 0018 = 8000E488 (00B068)
8000E474 (00B054) + 0028 = 8000E49C (00B07C)
8000E478 (00B058) + 0080 = 8000E4F8 (00B0D8)
- 26CF4 -
8003516C (031D4C) + 0080 = 800351EC (031DCC)
80035170 (031D50) + 0084 = 800351F4 (031DD4)
- 28CC -
80037A3C (03461C) + 0084 = 80037AC0 (0346A0)
80037A40 (034620) + 0090 = 80037AD0 (0346B0)
- 20C -
80037C4C (03482C) + 0090 = 80037CDC (0348BC)
80037C50 (034830) + 00AC = 80037CFC (0348DC)
- 5E0 -
80038230 (034E10) + 00AC = 800382DC (034EBC)
80038234 (034E14) + 00C8 = 800382FC (034EDC)
- 8 -
8003823C (034E1C) + 00C8 = 80038304 (034EE4)
- 4 bytes -> 0 bytes -
80038244 (034E24) + 00C4 = 80038308 (034EE8)
- 260 -
800384A4 (035084) + 00C4 = 80038568 (035148)
800384A8 (035088) + 00E0 = 80038588 (035168)
- 8 -
800384B0 (035090) + 00E0 = 80038590 (035170)
- 4 bytes -> 0 bytes -
800384B8 (035098) + 00DC = 80038594 (035174)
- 24C0 -
8003A978 (037558) + 00DC = 8003AA54 (037634)
- DOL 3755C to 375AC not in v1.02 -
8003A9D0 (0375B0) + 0088 = 8003AA58 (037638)
- 7B4 -
8003B184 (037D64) + 0088 = 8003B20C (037DEC)
- DOL 37D68 to 37D70 not in v1.02 -
8003B194 (037D74) + 007C = 8003B210 (037DF0)
- AC -
8003B240 (037E20) + 007C = 8003B2BC (037E9C)
- C bytes -> 4 bytes -
8003B250 (037E30) + 0074 = 8003B2C4 (037EA4)
- 1690 -
8003C8E0 (0394C0) + 0074 = 8003C954 (039534)
8003C8E4 (0394C4) + 0084 = 8003C968 (039548)
- C -
8003C8F0 (0394D0) + 0084 = 8003C974 (039554)
8003C8F4 (0394D4) + 0088 = 8003C97C (03955C)
- F38 -
3A40C + 0088 = 3A494
3A410 + 008C = 3A49C
- 18FC -
3BD0C + 008C = 3BD98
- 28 bytes -> 3C bytes -
3BD38 + 00A0 = 3BDD8
- C28 -
3C960 + 00A0 = 3CA00
3C964 + 00C4 = 3CA28
- F328 -
4BC8C + 00C4 = 4BD50
4BC90 + 00CC = 4BD5C
- 40C -
4C09C + 00CC = 4C168
4C0A0 + 00D4 = 4C174
- 41C -
4C4BC + 00D4 = 4C590
4C4C0 + 00DC = 4C59C
- 38C -
4C84C + 00DC = 4C928
4C850 + 00E4 = 4C934
- 594 -
4CDE4 + 00E4 = 4CEC8
4CDE8 + 00EC = 4CED4
- 3B4 -
4D19C + 00EC = 4D288
4D1A0 + 00F4 = 4D294
- 420 -
4D5C0 + 00F4 = 4D6B4
4D5C4 + 00FC = 4D6C0
- 3B4 -
4D978 + 00FC = 4DA74
4D97C + 0104 = 4DA80
- 444 -
4DDC0 + 0104 = 4DEC4
4DDC4 + 010C = 4DED0
- 3F0 -
4E1B4 + 010C = 4E2C0
4E1B8 + 0114 = 4E2CC
- 38C -
4E544 + 0114 = 4E658
4E548 + 011C = 4E664
- 26C -
4E7B4 + 011C = 4E8D0
4E7B8 + 0124 = 4E8DC

66740 + 0124 = 66864

> 365CFF + 1EB4 = 367BB3

> 38009A + 1EB4 = 381F4E

# END  FUNCT: 803B5368 (3B1F48) + 1EC4 = 803B722C (3B3E0C)
# DIFFERENCE: 18 (438) <=> 14 (434)
# START DATA: 803B5380 (3B2380) + 1EC0 = 803B7240 (3B4240)
--
803B7980 (3B4980) + 1EC0 = 803B9840 (3B6840)

803DDFB8 (3DAFB8) + 1EB8 = 803DFE70 (3DCE70)

From v1.01 to v1.02
803A480C + CE0 = 803A54EC

804C16CC + D8C = 804C2458
804C17CC + D8C = 804C2558

804D2980 + D20 = 804D36A0











From v1.02 to PAL

80157080 + 7A4 = 80157824
